meanings.definition: A distinctive smell, especially one that is pleasant.
meanings.sent1: The scents of fresh flowers filled the room.
meanings.sent2: I love the scents of baking cookies in the kitchen.
meanings.sent3: The scents of adventure and excitement lingered in the air.
meanings.sent4: Her perfume carried the scents of a blooming garden.
meanings.sent5: The scents of nostalgia brought back fond memories.

meanings.definition: To perceive or detect by or as if by the sense of smell.
meanings.sent1: The dog scents the trail of the missing cat.
meanings.sent2: She scents the aroma of coffee brewing in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The detective scents trouble ahead in the investigation.
meanings.sent4: He scents success in the upcoming project.
meanings.sent5: The chef scents the perfect blend of spices for the dish.

meanings.sent1: She wore a delightful scents that captivated everyone.
meanings.sent2: The scents of the ocean breeze brought a sense of calm.
meanings.sent3: The scents of the perfume shop tempted her to buy more.
meanings.sent4: His cologne carried the scents of the forest.
meanings.sent5: The scents of the flowers in the garden were intoxicating.
